Integrated Marketing Communication

This module focuses on the promotion and distribution part of the marketing mix. It aims at equipping students with articulated communication skills essential in marketing a product. It covers importance of dealing with media, leveraging their influence in publicizing a product, and managing their impact in case of crisis

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Comprehend the elements of communication process and integrate marketing communications.

+  Discuss effectiveness of various sales promotion tools and direct marketing programmes.

+  Choose appropriate advertising and media strategies based on company brand.

+  Assess effective public relation channels and approaches.

+  Evaluate the best communication strategies in dealing with crisis.

+  Design e-marketing campaign based on online channels.
